name: FROGGER (itch) (pichi02)
description:
Frogger is a video game released, originally as an arcade, in 1981. The license for worldwide distribution was from Sega / Gremlin and was developed by Konami. Frogger is a video game classic, which is still popular and many versions of it can be found on the Internet.

The objective of the game is to guide a frog to its home. To do so, the frog must avoid cars while crossing a congested road and then cross a river full of threats. The skilled player will earn additional points along the way.
